name: Document Translator
requirement: Applicants with experience of Chinese translation would be better
description: Translating updating documents of the organization(from Chinese/English to English/Chinese)
reward: Certificate of Volunteer; Certificate of Appreciation

name: Legal Specialist
requirement: Major in Law; familiar laws applied to non-profit organizations; familiar with contract law
description: Auditing contracts of cooperation and donations of IFU; auditing contracts of human resources; auditing constitutions of IFU; arrangement of other officers
reward: Certificate of Volunteer; Certificate of Appreciation

name: Panelists
requirement: Has experience in giving speech, able to express and communicate effectively and fluently; self-confident and affectionate; experience of studying abroad of no less than a year
description: Be able to talk fluently during break-out session and share you experience and stories during your study abroad and inspire and encourage international students
reward: Certificate of Volunteer; Certificate of Appreciation

name: Management Specialists
requirement: Familiar with Zoom or Bilibili; expert at writing and editing; good at communicating
description: Manage community operations among users during the carnival, solve doubts of students and their parents, manage the operation on Zoom and Bilibili
reward: Certificate of Volunteer; Certificate of Appreciation

name: Communication Specialists
requirement: Familiar with Zoom or Bilibili; expert at writing and editing articles; have the knowledge of editing videos and drawing out posters; good at communicating
description: Editing posters and articles for carnival, record the event, interview guests and participants, take charge of the report of the event and manage the operation of social medias
reward: Certificate of Volunteer; Certificate of Appreciation

name: Writer of WeChat Official Account
requirement: Better to have experience in new social media or major in journalism; expert in composing news report; able to translate from English to Chinese
description: Understand the needs of families of international students for information, send out correct message, alleviate the anxiety of families of international students during emergency; present real studying lives when abroad, share high-quality experience of studying abroad; propagate the image of IFU
reward: Certificate of Volunteer; Certificate of Appreciation

name: Operation of Instagram Account
requirement: Better to have background of designing pictures; please provide us with portfolios of your social media/blog if there is any
description: Plan for the operation and contents of Instagram, give feedback of data analysis to officers of Operation department regularly, improve the operation plan; in order to propagate the image of IFU, design for pictures and copywriting, collect and post photos of IFU events and teams
reward: Certificate of Volunteer; Certificate of Appreciation

name: Editor of WeChat Official Account
requirement: Able to use XIUMI to edit articles; better to have background of designing pictures; please provide us with portfolios of your social media/blog if there is any
description: Based on existing materials of copywriting, edit articles of WeChat official account to appeal to users
reward: Certificate of Volunteer; Certificate of Appreciation

name: Operation of Zhihu
requirement: Experience of studying abroad of no less than a year; better to have experience of operation of a Zhihu account
description: Plan for the operation and contents of Zhihu, give feedback of data analysis to officers of Operation department regularly, improve the operation plan; in order to propagate the image of IFU, design for pictures and copywriting, collect and post photos of IFU events and teams; select questions related to studying abroad, provide with high-quality answers; select high-quality contents from Wechat official account and post on Zhihu
reward: Certificate of Volunteer; Certificate of Appreciation

name: UI/UX Designer
requirement: Familiar with the usage of Figma/Sketch and so on; better to major in Graphic Design/Interactive Design or relative majors, please provide portfolios
description: According to the need of the development and the branding of IFU website, design for UI/UX for new webpages; collect and sort out the visual materials required for the preparation of web page development
reward: Certificate of Volunteer; Certificate of Appreciation

name: HR Assistant
requirement: Major in Business HR/Admin; better to have experience of internship related to HR/Admin
description: Supervise and take part in the design of the flowchart of modification to human resources(promotion, rearrangement and so on); update job post, resignation; resume screening; informing staff(ending probation, interview notification and so on)
reward: Certificate of Volunteer; Certificate of Appreciation

name: Web Copywriter and Translator
requirement: Better to have experience in translation between Chinese and English
description: Based on having correct understanding of IFU, compose copywriting required for web pages, translate and other related work arranged by department managers
reward: Certificate of Volunteer; Certificate of Appreciation

name: Video Content Creator
requirement: Familiar with AE or other film editing software(mobile included); have knowledge of trendy phrases, videos and music;able to combine those materials and present them in videos to appeal to audience
description: Help compose and edit videos for IFU on platforms such as Bilibili; help collect materials required for planned video if Operation Department has planned theme; create one video related to international students independently every month
reward: Certificate of Volunteer; Certificate of Appreciation

name: Administrative Assistant
requirement: Careful, responsible; better to have experience of interning in Administration Department in corporates
description: Sort and archive files of IFU; send out and reply administrative emails; take care of member emails; plan for team building activities, take memos, take care of administrative issues and so on
reward: Certificate of Volunteer; Certificate of Appreciation

name: Web Data Analyst
requirement: Major in Data Analytics or related majors; better to have experience in Web Analytics
description: Regularly collect the operational date of website; based on the data, analyse the efficiency of the website and make plans of development of website with UX designer and manager of the Design & Technology department
reward: Certificate of Volunteer; Certificate of Appreciation

name: Front-End Developer
requirement: Familiar with HTML&CSS, Vue, Javascript and so on; able to transit the web pages from static to dynamic independently; better to major in Computer Science, Interactive Design and related majors, and please provide portfolios
description: Based on the draft, build reasonable and efficient web pages; regular maintenance according to feedback from users, data and other team members
reward: Certificate of Volunteer; Certificate of Appreciation

name: Campus Leader
requirement: Undergraduate or graduates from universities overseas; has correct understanding of non-governmental organizations; recognize the goals of IFU and hope to contribute to international students; have experience in being a part of or building clubs alike
description: Besides carrying out basic duties of volunteers, campus leader is the person in charge of all volunteers of the university, manage and guide the team, recruit volunteers and attend monthly meetings of IFU and so on
reward: Certificate of Volunteer; Certificate of Appreciation

name: Campus Volunteer
requirement: Undergraduate or graduates from universities overseas; has correct understanding of non-governmental organizations; recognize the goals of IFU and hope to contribute to international students
description: Carrying out basic duties of volunteers; ensures messages are sent out, contact with Campus Leader at once when emergency happens; cooperate with Campus Leader to achieve the goal of alleviating the anxiety of families of international students
reward: Certificate of Volunteer; Certificate of Appreciation
